Module dbarsukova
Package dbarsukova.controller

Class FieldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbarsukova.controller.FieldController
  • public class FieldController
extends java.lang.Object
    FieldController class manages graphical representation of game field and its elements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FieldController​(Field field, int size, View view)
      constructs FieldController with specified field, block size and view.

      draws entire game field including food points, barrier points and snake.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldController

        public FieldController​(Field field,
                       int size,
                       View view)
        constructs FieldController with specified field, block size and view.
        Parameters:
        field - game field.
        size - size of each block on field.
        view - view used for graphical rendering.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size is less than or equal to 0 or view is null.

        Returns:
